item.title: Monkarufanta: The Hero and the Crystal Girl for Switch launches September 18 in Japan
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/06/monkarufanta-the-hero-and-the-crystal-girl-for-switch-launches-september-18-in-japan

  • Switch

Pre-orders open in mid-June.

Turn-based dungeon RPG Monkarufanta: The Hero and the Crystal Girl will launch for Switch on September 18 in Japan, developer Experience announced.

Pricing was not announced, but pre-orders will open in mid-June.

Here is an overview of the game, via Experience:

Story

The Demon Lord—a wicked being who appeared in a world of sword and sorcery.

It is said the Demon Lord commanded legions of monsters, and there were even towns that fell to his might. Many heroes rose to challenge him, but not one returned alive.

And so time passed…

The people of the world waited for another who would rise to face the Demon Lord again. And then, in a town where adventurers gathered, one finally appeared.

A new hero, destined to set off on a fateful journey.

Key Features

  • Enjoy hack-and-slash action from a top-down perspective.
  • Enjoy RPG dungeons and fields like the good old days.
  • Become the hero and defeat the Demon Lord with your companions in this classic fantasy story.
  • A nostalgic, yet new experience.
  • Companions are illustrated by Yuji Himukai.
  • Monsters are illustrated by Akifumi Yamamoto.

More Information to Come

More information regarding gameplay systems will be announced in mid-June 2025 when pre-orders open.

View a new set of screenshots at the gallery.
